title.value: Коррекция общей неспецифической резистентности организма телят продуктами пчеловодства
Correction of the general nonspecific resistency of calves by beekeeping products
Correction of the general nonspecific resistency of calves by beekeeping products

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Kodik, E.I., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: The researches on use of composite structure on the basis of beekeeping production for stimulation of cellular and humoral factors of protection of an organism of calves in colostrum-dairy period are carried out in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. There was established appreciable strengthening of blood neutrophil phagocyte activity and parameters of phagocyte index and phagocyte number at the animals received a complex preparation from beekeeping products. In 30 days after introduction of preparation blood phagocyte activity of skilled calves has increased from 33,8% up to 44,20% that exceeds a test objective level on 14,5% (Р 0,01). Phagocyte index and phagocyte number at animals of skilled group also was exceeded with parameters of young growth of control group on 26,5% and 10,6% (Р 0,05) accordingly. As a result of application of a complex preparation from beekeeping products in blood of calves of skilled group observed also the tendency to increase in the relative quantity of Т-lymphocytes, which have great importance in protection of an organism against the majority of bacterial and virus infections.
